cause.description:
This charity is to fund my travels around the world.
I aim to help different causes that matter to me!
So far I have taken part in:
The African Lion Rehabilitation Project, Zimbabwe: The world’s leading programme for the release of lions back into the wild. Here I was working as a volunteer based in Victoria Falls.
Over 200,000 lions used to roam the African continent, as recently as 1975. The latest estimates show an 80 – 90% population decline in the last 30 years. The end objective of the Victoria Falls lion project, along with the Antelope Park programme, is the reintroduction of the offspring of captive-bred lions into the wild by means of a four-stage process.
Other trips that I would like to partake in within the next 6 months: Working with orphans in Mombassa, Kenya/ and also in Malawi Sea turtle conservation project in Costa Rica Community Development in Mexico/ Brazil
I know I'm not going to change the world, but every little helps. If every person tried to make a difference then the world would be a better place.
Thanks :]
1. We must "make poverty history" - it will not magically go away
2. Animal cruely must end immediately
3. Millons of children are starving in Africa. We need to do something about it.
cause.mission: Get Trish around the world and help as many causes as she can
cause.name: Trisha's Travelling Fund
